nodes.text: Lurking Doom was an Esh-kha who was imprisoned by the Rakata on Belsavis, only to be released during the Galactic War. Lurking Doom was a servant of the World Razer.
Lurking Doom was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, where the Esh-kha sends Republic players a message if they made a deal with the World Razer.
